name: Ext.selection.CellModel
doc:
A selection model for grid panels which allows selection of a single cell at a time.

Implements cell based navigation via keyboard.

var store = Ext.create('Ext.data.Store', {
    fields  : ['name', 'email', 'phone'],
    data    : {
        items : [
            { name : 'Lisa',  email : 'lisa@simpsons.com',  phone : '555-111-1224' },
            { name : 'Bart',  email : 'bart@simpsons.com',  phone : '555-222-1234' },
            { name : 'Homer', email : 'homer@simpsons.com', phone : '555-222-1244' },
            { name : 'Marge', email : 'marge@simpsons.com', phone : '555-222-1254' }
        ]
    },
    proxy   : {
        type   : 'memory',
        reader : {
            type : 'json',
            root : 'items'
        }
    }
});

Ext.create('Ext.grid.Panel', {
    title    : 'Simpsons',
    store    : store,
    width    : 400,
    renderTo : Ext.getBody(),
    columns  : [
        { text : 'Name',  dataIndex : 'name'  },
        { text : 'Email', dataIndex : 'email', flex : 1 },
        { text : 'Phone', dataIndex : 'phone' }
    ],
    selType: 'cellmodel'
});

members.name: allowDeselect
members.doc: Allow users to deselect a record in a DataView, List or Grid. Only applicable when the mode is 'SINGLE'.
members.short_doc: Allow users to deselect a record in a DataView, List or Grid. ...

members.name: enableKeyNav
members.doc: Turns on/off keyboard navigation within the grid.
members.short_doc: Turns on/off keyboard navigation within the grid. ...

members.name: mode
members.doc:
Mode of selection. Valid values are:

  • "SINGLE" - Only allows selecting one item at a time. This is the default.
members.short_doc: Mode of selection. ...

members.name: preventWrap
members.doc: Set this configuration to true to prevent wrapping around of selection as a user navigates to the first or last column.
members.short_doc:
Set this configuration to true to prevent wrapping around of selection as
a user navigates to the first or last column. ...

members.name: pruneRemoved
members.doc:
Remove records from the selection when they are removed from the store.

Important: When using paging or a Ext.data.BufferedStore, records which are cached in the Store's data collection may be removed from the Store when pages change, or when rows are scrolled out of view. For this reason pruneRemoved should be set to false when using a buffered Store.

Also, when previously pruned pages are returned to the cache, the records objects in the page will be new instances, and will not match the instances in the selection model's collection. For this reason, you MUST ensure that the Model definition's idProperty references a unique key because in this situation, records in the Store have their IDs compared to records in the SelectionModel in order to re-select a record which is scrolled back into view.
members.short_doc: Remove records from the selection when they are removed from the store. ...

members.name: toggleOnClick
members.doc: true to toggle the selection state of an item when clicked. Only applicable when the mode is 'SINGLE'. Only applicable when the allowDeselect is 'true'.
members.short_doc: true to toggle the selection state of an item when clicked. ...

members.name: noSelection
members.doc: private property to use when firing a deselect when no old selection exists.

members.name: selected
members.doc: A MixedCollection that maintains all of the currently selected records.
members.short_doc: A MixedCollection that maintains all of the currently selected records. ...

members.name: afterKeyNavigate
members.doc: Private Called after a new record has been navigated to by a keystroke. Event is passed so that shift and ctrl can be handled.
members.short_doc:
Private
Called after a new record has been navigated to by a keystroke. ...

members.name: bindStore
members.short_doc: binds the store to the selModel. ...

members.name: bindStoreListeners
members.doc: Binds listeners for this component to the store. By default it will add anything bound by the getStoreListeners method, however it can be overridden in a subclass to provide any more complicated handling.
members.short_doc: Binds listeners for this component to the store. ...

members.name: clearSelections
members.doc: A fast reset of the selections without firing events, updating the ui, etc. For private usage only.
members.short_doc: A fast reset of the selections without firing events, updating the ui, etc. ...

members.name: deselectAll
members.short_doc: Deselects all records in the view. ...

members.name: deselectRange
members.doc: Deselects a range of rows if the selection model is not locked.

params.name: startRow
params.doc: The record or index of the first row in the range

params.name: endRow
params.doc: The record or index of the last row in the range

members.name: onColumnMove
members.doc:
When grid uses optimizedColumnMove (the default), this is added as a columnmove handler to correctly maintain the selected column using the same column header.

If optimizedColumnMove === false, (which some grid Features set) then the view is refreshed, so this is not added as a handler because the selected column.
members.short_doc:
When grid uses optimizedColumnMove (the default), this is added as a
columnmove handler to correctly maintain the

params.name: endRow
